r and low birth weight babies
• Investigations
o Urinalysis: Positive for Leucocytes AND nitrites.
• Treatment
o Give empiric treatment if symptoms present with nitrites AND leukocytes on dipstick
o Encourage increase in oral fluid intake
• Empiric treatment (no culture available or while waiting for culture):
o Fosfomycin, oral, 3 g as a single dose
OR
o Nitrofurantoin 100mg 6 hourly for 5 days
Acute pyelonephritis 
• Presentation: Dysuria, frequency, fever, rigors, abdominal pain, loin pain
